content: This is the equivilant of Japan's taking part in the seizure of Tsingtao and the hunt for German Cruisers in WW1. They want the experience. I hope we saw this coming back when they went out to make their bones on Somali pirates.
reply: This is the equivilant of Japan's taking part in the seizure of Tsingtao and the hunt for German Cruisers in WW1. They want the experience. I hope we saw this coming back when they went out to make their bones on Somali pirates.
title: China now vows to protect PRC merchant ships worldwide
